animeTitle: Gekkou no Pierce: Yumemi to Gin no Bara no Kishidan
animeDescription: Because of a mysterious earring, Yumemi a young japanese student, becomes involved in a mysterious story. She must go to Germany, where she learns that the spirit of an evil prince is haunting her earring...
animeStaff: [['Mori Takeshi', ['Director']], ['Fujiyama Fusanobu', ['Sound Director']], ['Tsurumaki Kazuya', ['Key Animation']], ['Maeda Mahiro', ['Key Animation']]]
